Question.Subject: How can you solve this ????????
Question.Content: tell me how to connect Nokia E63 to bsnl broadband through wifi. My bsnl router is wireless
Question.ChosenAnswer: Sorry, your phone has no other way to connect. Since the router has no wireless, it would be like trying to connect your phone to a toaster. You will NEED a wireless access point (such as a wireless capable router) in order to connect properly.

Answer.Content: Sorry, your phone has no other way to connect. Since the router has no wireless, it would be like trying to connect your phone to a toaster. You will NEED a wireless access point (such as a wireless capable router) in order to connect properly.
